column4: Microsoft  Amazon video to join Disney's cloud movie service
column5: Walt Disney Co's studio unit said customers of Amazon.com Inc and Microsoft Corp's video services will get access to the collection on its cloud-based movie storage service from Tuesday.

column4: Microsoft  Amazon video to join Disney's cloud movie service
column5: Sept 8 Walt Disney Co's studio unit said customers of Amazon.com Inc and Microsoft Corp's  video services will get access to the collection on its cloud-based movie storage service from Tuesday.

column4: U.S.  tech industry fight over email privacy heads to appeals court
column5: NEW YORK A U.S. appeals court on Wednesday will consider whether U.S. law enforcement can make American technology companies hand over customers' emails held overseas  in a case closely watched by privacy advocates  news organizations and business groups.
